lyrics:

all that i know
is you caught me at the right time
keep me in your glow
cause im having such a good time

baby dont you know
that youre my golden hour
the color of my sky

and i know i know everythings gonna be alright

verse 2
i used to get sad
and lonely when the sun went down
but its different now
cause i love the light that ive found
in you

baby dont you know
that youre my golden hour
the color of my sky
youve set my world on fire
and i know i know everythings gonna be alright
you might also likebridge
you make the world look beautiful ooh

but looking through your eyes
it looks like paradise

and i know i know everythings gonna be alright

the color of my sky
